original_text: A descendant of Jacob will become their ruler. He will destroy all the people who are still alive in the city.’
korean_text: 주권자가 야곱에게서 나서 남은 자들을 그 성읍에서 멸절하리로다 하고

sentences.original_text: A descendant of Jacob will become their ruler.
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱의 후손이 그들의 통치자가 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He will destroy all the people
who are still alive in the city.
